data: PED/NEO TM Factor Replacement Hemophilia A and B (Factor VIII / Factor IX) (Module)
Products expire 3 hours from reconstitution. Confirm dose times with TM. Product will not be reconstituted until patient is ready for transfusion

STAT, IU, IV, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, once, T;N

Timed, IU, IV, Administer over:  Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, q24h
